title: 50 Percent Discounts...
content: Greater Albion Typefounders are currently offering two of related families, [Bromwich](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416195959/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/bromwich/) and [Great Bromwich](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416195959/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/great-bromwich/) at a 50% discount.
author: Rasendyll
